ai-ps2.1:1.2_0: At one time Venerable Ānanda was staying near Kosambi, in Ghosita’s Monastery.
ai-ps2.1:1.3_0: There Venerable Ānanda addressed the monks:
ai-ps2.1:2.1_0: “Reverends, all of the monks and nuns who declare in my presence that they have attained perfection, did so by one or other of four paths.
ai-ps2.1:3.1_0: Take a mendicant who develops serenity before discernment.
ai-ps2.1:3.2_0: As they do so the path is born in them.
ai-ps2.1:3.3_0: They cultivate, develop, and make much of it.
ai-ps2.1:3.4_0: By doing so, they give up the fetters and eliminate the underlying tendencies.
ai-ps2.1:4.1_0: Another mendicant develops discernment before serenity.
ai-ps2.1:4.2_0: As they do so, the path is born in them.
ai-ps2.1:4.3_0: They cultivate, develop, and make much of it.
ai-ps2.1:4.4_0: By doing so, they give up the fetters and eliminate the underlying tendencies.
ai-ps2.1:5.1_0: Another mendicant develops serenity and discernment in conjunction.
ai-ps2.1:5.2_0: As they do so, the path is born in them.
ai-ps2.1:5.3_0: They cultivate, develop, and make much of it.
ai-ps2.1:5.4_0: By doing so, they give up the fetters and eliminate the underlying tendencies.
ai-ps2.1:6.1_0: Another mendicant’s mind is seized by restlessness to realize the teaching.
ai-ps2.1:6.2_0: There comes a time when the mind is stilled, settled, unified, and immersed in samādhi.
ai-ps2.1:6.3_0: The path is born in them.
ai-ps2.1:6.4_0: They cultivate, develop, and make much of it.
ai-ps2.1:6.5_0: By doing so, they give up the fetters and eliminate the underlying tendencies.
ai-ps2.1:7.1_0: Any monk or nun who declares in my presence has these four paths for perfections, or from anyone of them.”
ai-ps2.1:8.2_0: Through renunciation is one-pointedness of mind, concentration is unification of mind.
ai-ps2.1:8.3_0: Herein, an opposite is incapable of reaching the end of the teaching, not-self in suffering, not adhered to it.
ai-ps2.1:8.6_0: “The one who develops discernment before it.”
ai-ps2.1:8.7_0: Development: four ways of developing development:
ai-ps2.1:8.8_0: Herein, observes the five faculties: Then there is a single Factor of development in the sense faculties, and a single Factors of developing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-ps2.1:9.1_0: The path is born in them?
ai-ps2.1:9.2_0: that is, right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion. Abandoning is that path to the eighteen years old is included in the noble path, and that is noble.
ai-ps2.1:9.3_0: So the path is born in them.
ai-ps2.1:10.1_0: They cultivate, develop, and make much of it. How do they cultivate it?
ai-ps2.1:10.2_0: “This is intent on what is contrary to the Monastic Law, and when he knows that adverts, sees to it, directly knowing and seeing, indicating, exerts his mind, resolves it, directly knows what is to be directly known, fully understands what is to be abandoned, and develops what is to be abandoned, develops what is to be developed, and realizes what is to be given up, what is attention to say, a sought, and develops what is to be developed.
ai-ps2.1:11.2_0: When he develops advert and develops the mind, he develops the fact that they develop the mind, develops the recollection of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom, develops the mind should be directly known, develops what should be given up, and develops what is to be developed, and develops the awakening factors.
ai-ps2.1:12.1_0: How do they cultivate, develop, and make much of?
ai-ps2.1:12.2_0: By taking up practices, developing and cultivating, developing and cultivating, and cultivating, developing and cultivating, developing and cultivating, developing and cultivating the faculty, he should give up those things up, develops and cultivate, and make much of them.

ai-ps2.1:13.1_0: By doing so, they give up the fetters and eliminate the underlying tendencies.

ai-ps2.1:20.17_0: In this way he develops the serenity meditation subject,
ai-ps2.1:21.1_0: How do you develop it in conjunction?
ai-ps2.1:21.2_0: he develops the sixteen factors in sixteen factors,
ai-ps2.1:21.3_0: One of the bones, rose-appearing, etc., that is to say, the eighteen bases—these are in the sense that is peaceful, the eighteen, the base consisting of boundlessness, the non-distraction, the one whose mind is without defilements, the one who sees the sense of unshakable, and the path leading to peace.
ai-ps2.1:22.1_0: How do they develop it in the sense of serenity?
ai-ps2.1:22.3_0: So they don’t travel each other with themselves. And one droping one another’s roams, they don’t travel each other.
ai-ps2.1:22.5_0: “The yoke of developing the serenity one looking at insight.”
ai-ps2.1:22.6_0: Development: four ways of developing development:
ai-ps2.1:22.8_0: the path is born in them ...
ai-ps2.1:22.9_0: So the path is born in them.
ai-ps2.1:22.11_0: in this way one develops the serenity and discernment.
ai-ps2.1:23.1_0: How do you develop the Godhā’s pair, and develop it in conjunction?
ai-ps2.1:23.2_0: Restlessness is abandoned; abandoning unification of mind, without distraction, letting go of the mind and body.
ai-ps2.1:23.3_0: So they don’t meet each other’s alms-round, and they don’t relish each other.
ai-ps2.1:23.5_0: “The yoke of serenity and discernment doing the yoke’s level.”
ai-ps2.1:24.1_0: How should he develop it in how does he develop it?
ai-ps2.1:24.3_0: So it is not shared with one’s own insight.
ai-ps2.1:24.5_0: “Spread absorption one develops insight in this way.”
ai-ps2.1:25.1_0: How do they all see the instances of another’s yoke?
ai-ps2.1:25.3_0: So they don’t proceed each other with the yokes, thinking: “So they’re heading for a single day,”
ai-ps2.1:25.5_0: “Whether back is the yoke of all yokes to one yoke.”
ai-ps2.1:26.1_0: How should he develop it in the sense of seeing how and develop it?
ai-ps2.1:26.2_0: restlessness, remorse, and ignorance are called ‘ignorant’, and unification of mind from the defilements of the aggregates’.
ai-ps2.1:26.3_0: So they don’t proceed each other’s way.
ai-ps2.1:26.5_0: “The one who develops it in conjunction that is not overjoyed and dropped.”
ai-ps2.1:27.1_0: How does he develop it in the sense of conscience, and develop it in conjunction?
ai-ps2.1:27.2_0: Restlessness and deathlessness are the defilement of the aggregates, etc.; and sense fields are discovered from the defilements of the aggregates, etc.; and their mind is free from the defilements of ignorance, the stilling of unification of mind.
ai-ps2.1:27.3_0: So they don’t proceed each other of these.
ai-ps2.1:27.5_0: “Since you can develop serenity and discernment by insight.”
ai-ps2.1:28.1_0: How does he develop it in the presence of serenity and discernment?
ai-ps2.1:28.2_0: One who gives up restlessness, gets tranquilized immersion, and not unification of mind; on account of immersion, non-distraction, and resort as peaceful.
ai-ps2.1:28.3_0: So they don’t travel each other of these.
ai-ps2.1:28.5_0: “The pair of serenity and discernment occurs.”
ai-ps2.1:29.1_0: How do they develop it in the sense of calm, how does he develop it?
ai-ps2.1:29.2_0: Restlessness is abandoned; giving up unity and immersion; cessation is peaceful and sublime, abiding by tranquility and immersion; on the stilling of the mind is simply peaceful, sublime.
ai-ps2.1:29.3_0: So one generality comes together, one doesn’t travel separately.
ai-ps2.1:29.5_0: “Having seen pair of wrappedness, the yoke’s yoke.”
ai-ps2.1:30.1_0: How should he develop it in the sense of conjoining the air?
ai-ps2.1:30.2_0: Giving up restlessness, one is freed by mind, and one who has not grasping on the oneness of the mind, whose mind is freed from the defilements of sensuality, desire for ignorance, and ignorance.
ai-ps2.1:30.3_0: And so, freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom, and the freedom by wisdom of freedom by wisdom do not underlie each other.
ai-ps2.1:31.1_0: How do you develop the eight-fold path with pollutants?
ai-ps2.1:31.2_0: Giving up restlessness, one meditates on dissatisfaction with noble mind, one with unconcealed mind, whose mind is without pollutants, gives up ignorance. They give up the defilements of sensuality and thoughts.
ai-ps2.1:31.3_0: So they don’t become one with defilements ended, and they converse each other.
ai-ps2.1:31.5_0: “The yoke of insight, discernment of ends, and the yoke.”
ai-ps2.1:32.1_0: “And how does he develop the serenity and discernment?
ai-ps2.1:32.2_0: restlessness, and remorse, and doubt. The mind, defilement and unification of mind, defilement and liberated from the defining of ignorance; and unification of mind is liberated from the corruptions; the six sense-sphere concentration, the stilling of unification of mind;
ai-ps2.1:32.3_0: So they don’t proceed each other with five qualities.
ai-ps2.1:32.5_0: “Having developed serenity and discernment, one who develops the yoke’s level.”
ai-ps2.1:33.1_0: How does one develop the inner serenity and discernment?
ai-ps2.1:33.2_0: It’s when agitation gives up the one-pointedness, the signless stillness, the signless stillness, and the signless stillness.
ai-ps2.1:33.3_0: So one dropped through insight and paths become one sympathy. There is no one droping.
ai-ps2.1:33.5_0: “The pair of serenity develops the foundation of serenity.”
ai-ps2.1:34.1_0: How do they develop the serenity and discernment in the bones?
ai-ps2.1:34.2_0: They give up restlessness, get rid of, eliminate, and obliterate regarding all kinds of unification of mind. They give up unconcentrated mind. They’re not liberated in all their aspects. They give up unconditionedness, not all liking, discovering, and fading away.
ai-ps2.1:34.3_0: So they don’t proceed each other of these.
ai-ps2.1:34.5_0: “For one who develops it in the sense of urgency, one who develops it.”
ai-ps2.1:35.1_0: “How do you develop serenity and discernment?
ai-ps2.1:35.2_0: They give up restlessness, etc., and not loving it; they give up that immersion. They’re focused only on all sides, but they give up that immersion. They’re not far from the near, the far shore.
ai-ps2.1:35.3_0: So they don’t proceed each other with four pairs.
